title: Jury in MEV bot trial struggles to reach verdict as weekend approaches
summary: Defense attorneys reportedly requested a mistrial as jurors said they weren’t close to reaching a verdict in the case involving a $25 million Ethereum exploit.

title: Don't blame ETFs, BTC sell-off 'coming from inside the house': Analyst
summary: Outflows from Bitcoin ETFs over the last month have been relatively small despite October's historic market crash that slashed prices by 20%.

title: My First Bitcoin ends El Salvador program, pivots to global BTC education
summary: The Bitcoin education initiative is closing its local operations and rebranding for a global mission, shifting from teaching students in El Salvador to training educators worldwide.

title: Balancer makes last appeal to hacker behind $100M+ exploit
summary: The DAO behind the exchange issued an onchain warning to those responsible for a major exploit: Return the funds for a bounty or face the consequences.

title: Coinbase, Block, Robinhood highlight dismal week for crypto stocks
summary: Crypto stocks slid as macro fears, government shutdown jitters and lingering fallout from October's $19 billion liquidation hit investor sentiment.

title: New Bitcoin highs could take 2 to 6 months but data says it’s worth the wait: Analysis
summary: Bitcoin dropped 20% from its all-time high, leaving analysts split on whether a slow recovery or a fresh parabolic price breakout will happen in the next few months.

title: Balancer exploit and Stream contagion expose DeFi’s fragile core: Finance Redefined
summary: Balancer and Stream Finance incidents totaling over $200 million shook DeFi as RedStone and major Ethereum protocols launched reform initiatives.

title: Bitcoin Coinbase Premium hits 7-month low but traders spot a silver lining
summary: Bitcoin dipped below $100,000 as the Coinbase Premium hit a seven-month low, signaling weak US demand. Onchain data hints that short-term holders may be buying the dip.

title: Strategy prices new STRE preferred shares to fund Bitcoin accumulation
summary: The company continues to offer corporate debt securities and equities to finance its Bitcoin acquisitions despite recent troubles.

title: Polymarket rife with ‘artificial trading,’ Columbia University researchers find
summary: A Columbia study found that up to 60% of Polymarket’s volume may stem from wash trading, raising new concerns about artificial activity in prediction markets.
